alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 6:00AM PST until December 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. Blowing and drifting snow Thursday morning. * WHERE...Mansfield, Bridgeport, Okanogan, Oroville, Badger Mountain Road, Waterville, Nespelem, Disautel Pass, Omak, and Brewster. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northerly winds will result in blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
